title: Fahanka Xog Jabka iyo Sida Loo Jawaabo

understanding.heading: Waa Maxay Xog Jab?
paragraphs: Xog jabku waa marka xog xasaasi ah ama qarsoodi ah si aan oggolaansho lahayn loo helo ama loo faafiyo.

bullets.label: Helitaanka Aan La Oggolayn
bullets.desc: Marka qof si sharci darro ah u helo xog.

bullets.label: Xog Faqday
bullets.desc: Xog si kama' ah u fashilantay ama loo daadiyay.

bullets.label: Jabinta (Hacking)
bullets.desc: Weeraro sharci darro ah oo la beegsanayo nuglaanta nidaamka.

bullets.label: Khiyaamo (Phishing)
bullets.desc: Isku dayo khiyaano ah si loo helo xog xasaasi ah.

bullets.label: Erey Sir Fudud
bullets.desc: Erey sir fudud oo si sahal ah loo malayn karo.

bullets.label: Nidaam Aan La Cusbooneysiin
bullets.desc: Nidaamyada aan la cusbooneysiin waxay ka dhigaan bartilmaameed fudud.

bullets.label: Isticmaal Erey Sir Adag
bullets.desc: Samee ereyo sir adag oo marar badan cusboonaysii.

bullets.label: Adeegso Laba-Tallaabo Oggolaansho
bullets.desc: Kordhi badbaadada xisaabtaada adigoo adeegsanaya laba-tallaabo oggolaansho.

impact.heading: Saameynta Xog Jabka
paragraphs: Xog jabku wuxuu sababi karaa khasaare dhaqaale, sumcad xumo, iyo cawaaqib sharciyeed oo aad u weyn.

response.heading: Sida Loo Jawaabo Xog Jab
paragraphs: Hayâ€™aduhu waa inay si degdeg ah u xakameeyaan jabinta, u wargeliyaan dadka ay khusayso, islamarkaana qaadaan tallaabooyin kahortag ah.
